column4: hi all.....I'm getting asked for the password for keyring something or other everytime i start feisty....never had this in 6.10.....any ideas or suggestions....(BTW, this is the WIFE's computer.....and I am trying to get her off her Windoze addiction....but she's not liking having to enter anymore passwords than she needs to when booting up.....so some way of entering this once so it doesn't keep asking would be great)
Pick a new password.  It's to protect your WEP key.
that's why you're being prompted.  The key is saved in the keyring... which is password protected.  You won't be bothered for it again.
